title: Harvard Endowment Investor and Other Business Leaders Take a Solidarity Trip to Israel
description:
Harvard, a flash point in the campus fights over the war in Gaza, has seen controversy and activism over its endowment's investments in Israel.

The post Harvard Endowment Investor and Other Business Leaders Take a Solidarity Trip to Israel appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Bernie Sanders to Force Vote on Israeli War Crimes. . . ISI Document Blows Up Pakistan's Case Against Imran Khan
description:
Sanders officially took the first step toward conditioning military aid to Israel.

The post Bernie Sanders to Force Vote on Israeli War Crimes. . . ISI Document Blows Up Pakistan’s Case Against Imran Khan appeared first on The Intercept.
